So Linda, I'd like to get your opinion of how the meeting went.
I thought it went very well. You had a clear goal and you stuck to it.
Brainstorming suggestions was the only thing on the agenda.
I think it also helped that you prepared your own suggestion to start with.
That got people thinking before you went around the table to hear other people's views...
...and I would add that your organization kept the meeting from running over time.
Thanks, Linda. I feel we made real progress today with our sales strategy.
